text: 1. Click the box below 'Run' and watch the video. What do you hear?
2. Close your eyes or click uncheck 'Show video' Do you hear something different?
3. Watch the video and click 'change audio.' Do you hear a difference?
4. Click the box below 'Show Words' to see the actual words that are sounding.
5. If the audio and video are out of sync, click 'Restart'
6. When run is unchecked, you can click on the name of the speaker to change to a different speaker
